sentences.en: By submitting to male values symbolically affirm male superiority.
sentences.cn: 对男性价值观的臣服进一步增强了男性的优越性.

sentences.en: By wearing the ring on the third finger of the left hand, a married couple symbolically declares their eternal love for each other.
sentences.cn: 将婚戒戴在左手的第三只手指上, 意味着夫妻双方象征性地宣告他们的爱情天长地久,他们定能白头偕老.

sentences.en: He nodded symbolically at Xiao Gang's words.
sentences.cn: 听了小刚的话,他只是象征性地点了点头.

sentences.en: In order to have language, any language, you need to be able to think symbolically.
sentences.cn: 为了有语言，无论任何语言，你需要能够象征性地思想。

sentences.en: Say I have an online resource that I want you to symbolically pay for.
sentences.cn: 比如，我有一个在线资源，希望您能象征性地为其付出代价。

sentences.en: Symbolically the deity confers the initiations and the mandala is where the initiations takes place.
sentences.cn: 象征性地神赠予开始,而且曼荼罗是开始发生的地方.

sentences.en: Symbolically, he coughed to clear his throat.
sentences.cn: 周经理象征地咳一声无谓的嗽, 清清嗓子.

sentences.en: Thethe building symbolically ascends from the ground to enhance the display the southwestern sunshine.
sentences.cn: 东侧建设象征上升从地面,以提高显示西南阳光.

sentences.en: Thinking symbolically is the foundation of everything we do — we live in a symbolic world.
sentences.cn: 象征性思维是我们做一切的基础，我们生活在一个符号的世界里。

words.tran_cn: 象征的；符号的；使用符号的
象征，象征主义；符号论；记号
象征主义者；符号学者；记号使用者
象征；符号表现；象征作用
符号学，符号使用；象征学，象征的使用
采用象征；使用符号；作为…的象征
